title: 102: The Behind the Scenes at Hungry Girl Episode
itunes:title: The Behind the Scenes at Hungry Girl Episode
description: In this week’s episode, Lisa and the gang are dishing out what’s coming up in the world of Hungry Girl for the rest of the year and beyond! When's the next magazine coming out? When is the next book is coming out (and what’s the title)? Plus, everything there is to know about YOUR DAILY BRIGHT BOOST, including an exclusive interview! And there’s a contest for a chance to win awesome HG swag! So what are you waiting for? This is THE episode for the ultimate Hungry Girl fan! When you’re done listening, jump over to the Foodcast page for highlights from the episode!
itunes:summary: What’s happening in the world of Hungry Girl, you ask? A LOT!!! This episode has the full scoop...
itunes:author: Lisa Lillien
dc:creator: Lisa Lillien
